body.name: Queen Bed Frame with Charging Station, Queen Size Platform Bed Frame with Storage Shelf Headboard, Wood & Metal Queen-Size Bedframe, Noise-Free Base Foundation, No Box Spring Needed, Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 5 hrs 41 mins
features: Queen Bed Frame with Charging Station:Experience the convenience of integrated technology in your bed frame. The queen platform bed frame features a headboard with a charging station, complete with 2 USB ports and 2 power outles, merging modern living with ultimate comfort.

Storage Shelf Headboard: The charging station headboard includes 2 tier vintage shelf, offering practicality while matching any room style. It's a blend of function and fashion that complements various interior decor themes.

Sturdy Structure & No Box Spring Needed: The queen bed frame is reinforced with heavy-duty metal slats, enhancing its sturdiness and durability. This design provides optimum support for all types of mattresses without the need for a box spring.

Underbed Storage Space: Offering a generous 10.4 inches of underbed storage space. This space is perfect for storing off-season clothing, children's books, toys, and more, maximizing room space and creating a tidy and organized bedroom.
East to Setup: Each part of the queen platform bed is clearly labeled and numbered, making assembly straightforward and efficient.
body.description: Description： The queen bed frame consists of a durable wood headboard and footboard, heavy-duty metal slats, and extra strong support legs. The 2 tiers headboard features built-in 2 USB charging ports, making it convenient to plug in your phone, tablet, and alarm clock at any time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Description on product is what we got out of the box. Easy to put together and sturdy! Nice bed frame for the price and materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to our guest room!
reviews.reviewText: The bed arrived 1 day early in one large, heavy box. We were a bit apprehensive about our ability to put it together since both my husband and I are in our 80’s. We decided to give it a try. The bed is to be used in our guest room but occasionally, if one or the other of us is sick, the other will sleep in the guest room to avoid being disturbed by coughing, etc. I am happy to say we were able to assemble the bed by ourselves. The parts are all clearly labeled and the numbered, pictorial directions are easy to follow. While they haven’t visited since the bed arrived, we’re sure our grandchildren will appreciate the charging station at the head of the bed. This was a very good purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good frame, love the lights, small support bars
reviews.reviewText: The frame is beautiful, its a good height for me & i absolutely love the lights that come on this bed. Plus the charging ports are an awesome benefit. The most negative thing i’ll say is that this was kind of a pain to put together, the bug wood piece did not fit correctly and i was getting frustrated but I figured it out after like 10 min.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and easy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Sturdy and pretty simple to put together it’s all spot on for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love my new queen bed frame! Directions were easy to read, every piece was there. Took me like 3 hours to put together(probably easier with 2 people)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations!
reviews.reviewText: Assembly took about an hour and a half by myself, it’s exactly as pictured! Very sturdy, great product for the cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great for teens
reviews.reviewText: If you love a bed that you can hear any move you make this is perfect for you if you sleep better lopsided then by all means buy this bed if you are married or an adult and have your partner or partners over without making to much noise don't use this bed it doesn't squeak but it does bang on the ground since the front is about an inch off the ground and worse on the left side the screw didn't fit we used the correct one we know because we tried the same screw on the right side and it fit fine we had to use tissue to give it more traction inorder for it to stay inside all in all would never buy another bed from Amazon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST PRICE BEST QUALITY!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am in love with this!! I couldn’t be happier. It doesn’t move around at all, it’s VERY sturdy, easy assembly, I didn’t have to deal with missing parts or anything. I did a lot of research and I’m so glad I went with this one. Note that the led lights that come with only has 3 colors. I would go with getting another reel of leds if you want more color and they will work just as well!
